pageContext.claim: “The Coronavirus is very much under control in the USA. We are in contact with everyone and all relevant countries. CDC & World Health have been working hard and very smart. Stock Market starting to look very good to me!”
pageContext.analysis: The coronavirus was not under control in the USA; it was silently raging through the country. Trump was lulled by relatively low case numbers at the time but CDC officials were already warning people to be prepared for a possible pandemic. There's a two to three week time lag in infections showing up in data. By March 16, there were almost 5,000 reported cases and 100 deaths.
